--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, samurai@x wrote:
> <pcfarrar@b...> writes:
> 
> > Hi,
> > Does anyone know who the seller is on eBay going by the handle 
> > katana.jap It says he is from Kobe Japan.

He is a Frenchman living in Japan. Some of his goods (tsuba)
are ok, some have been burned and refinished, some are
repros. Ask lots of detailed questions of the dealer on
the item you're thinking about; especially about condition,
authenticity (period) and whether it has been burned or not.

Rich S
